name: itk-cleaver
description: npm scripts to generate itk-wasm artifacts.

scripts.build: npm run build:emscripten && npm run build:wasi && npm run bindgen:typescript
scripts.bindgen:typescript: itk-wasm -b emscripten-build bindgen --output-dir wasm/typescript --package-name @itk-wasm/cleaver --package-description "The Cleaver multimaterial tetrahedral meshing tool." --repository 'https://github.com/SCIInstitute/Cleaver2'
